title: Problem with camera when instantiating two of the same robot type

content.raw:
When running the following command:

‌

```
ign launch -v 4 virtual_stix.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
```

\(note that both robotConfigX arguments are X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_4\)

‌

I see incorrect image data on the /model/X1/front/image\_raw ignition topic \(and the corresponding ROS topic\): it seems to flicker back and forth between the viewpoint of the two robots. Furthermore, the /X2/front/image\_raw ROS topic is never published\).
